comment: George is GREAT! You have to read your book, go to class, and check his website daily, which are all easy. He really cares about you and wants you to succeed. He grades a little tough and gives pop quizzes often, but if you do your work they aren't hard at all. HIGHLY recommend.

Mr. Lopos is very nice and willing to help you with your writing but his help is honestly useless. He grades very hard on papers and gives random pop quizzes. He grades papers based on grammar (ALOT) and his opinion of it. I consistently got b's on mine and asked for help on how to improve but still didn't help. I only got an A because of the final

He is a nice guy but honestly he makes zero sense when he talks. Emails you everyday about something useless he wants you to read. His class is all over the place. Papers are not easy. Grades hard. Loves the Newyorkr magazine
The BEST teacher I have had at Kennesaw EVER. He's so friendly and nice and funny. His tests are super easy and he has all these out of the box ideas. He's the best teacher ever, take him!!

He seems to genuinely care about what he is teaching, however he is ALWAYS unclear about assignments and constantly changes due dates. He grades incredibly hard as well... I usually receive A's on papers and I consistently got Cs and Bs in this class. If he doesn't like the way you write/your style you will get a bad grade in this class.

Very nice and funny guy, also extremely smart. However, this class is really difficult mostly due to the confusion he causes. Never clear on assignments, you pretty much have to email him every time to clarify. Grades pretty harshly on papers, you cannot BS them. They need to be very thought provoking for him to approve, not just factual.

He is the funniest teacher I've ever had but, I would not recommend his class. He is not clear at all when explaining assignments and often does not post anything online. There are a few papers I wrote that were never graded because the other students couldn't understand the assignment (I couldn't much either)but I don't like wasting time.
By far the smartest and funniest man alive. he makes you work for your grade but you definatly try harder to impress him. GEORGE YOU THE MAN!

George was the best english teacher I've ever had. He keeps the class fun, even with his lectures and can make a lesson out of almost anything. Grading is a little tough, but worth it, he wont fail you.
Best Teacher I have ever had. If you want an awesome experience then take George. He is very helpful and a lot of fun. Was always amused and had good time.

George is the man!!! he keeps his class very interesting and has a great sense of humor, even though it might be a little strange at first. He grades his papers sort of hard, but it is a great class. He loves the New Yorker, so if you do not like the New Yorker do not take this class.
HARD! contradicts what you learned in high school
